meanings.sent1: The celebrity waved to the crowd.
meanings.sent2: Many people wanted to take a picture with the celebrity.
meanings.sent3: The celebrity's dog became famous too!
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, she was a shining celebrity.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights followed the celebrity wherever they went.

meanings.definition: The state of being well-known or celebrated.
meanings.sent2: The town celebrated her celebrity with a parade.
meanings.sent3: The cake's celebrity status made it disappear quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The celebrity of the painting drew many admirers.
meanings.sent5: The celebrity of the new movie spread like wildfire.
